}} {{Album ratings |rev1 = Allmusic |rev1score = |title=Evolve -
Endo|publisher=Allmusic}} }} 'Evolve (v3.0)' is the debut album by the Florida-
based nu metal/hard rock music group Endo. The album was released on March 20,
2001 via DV8/Columbia Records (a division of Sony Music). The track "Malice" is
present on the soundtrack for the film, Dracula 2000.
